TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement

summary.span: 表示 安全性權杖的宣告，它會判斷提示是否已做出有關主體存取指定資源的授權決策。

span.span: Represents a claim for a security token that asserts that an authorization decision regarding access by the subject to the specified resource has been made.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全性權杖會使用 SAML 判斷提示來指定其宣告，而這種判斷指示可指定主體是否已獲得存取特定資源的授權。 security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify whether a subject is authorized to access a specific resource. SAML 判斷提示中的宣告會以 SAML 陳述式表示。The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements. SAML 規格會定義一組 SAML 陳述式型別，而其中一個為 。The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a . ，它會判斷提示是否已做出有關主體存取指定資源的授權決策。An asserts an authorization decision regarding access by the subject to the specified resource has been made. 下表會摘要列出與授權決策關聯的屬性。The following table summarizes the properties that are associated with the authorization decision. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||SAML 授權單位根據 屬性提供之資源所呈現的授權決策。The authorization decision rendered by the SAML authority with respect to the resource represented by the property.| ||SAML 授權單位在呈現決策時所仰賴的 SAML 判斷提示集合。A set of SAML assertions that the SAML authority relied on to render the decision.| ||URI 參考，其中會識別要請求其存取權的資源。A URI reference that identifies the resource to which access is sought.| ||主體已獲授權在 屬性所提供之資源上執行的動作集合。The set of actions that the subject is authorized to perform on the resource represented by the property.|

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會將 屬性初始化為 `false`，並將 屬性初始化為 `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`。This constructor initializes the property to `false` and the property to `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`.
